name: Life Force
description:
Pilot the Vic Viper on a mission to destroy an enormous alien that threatens to devour the galaxy!

Classic shoot â€˜em up Life Force is a spin-off of the seminal Gradius series, featuring six stages that take place inside the gigantic creature, alternating between horizontally and vertically scrolling environments.

Collect capsules to gain new weapons and power-ups, and defeat the bosses at the end of each stage. Go it alone or team up with a friend in the cooperative two player mode via Download Play.
